content.rendered:
Automatically collect payments
from your customers.

Simplify your invoicing process and keep the payments
coming with Auto Pay!
Free Quote
Contact Sales

Enroll Customers

Sign up your customers who put in orders throughout every month. 

Send Invoices

Send invoices as orders come in. 

Collect Payments

Automatically collect payments at the end of the billing cycle.

Repeat

Continue to invoice and collect payments from Auto Pay customers every month. 

How is Auto Pay different from recurring billing?

Recurring billing is for an established product or service that is the same every month. Auto Pay allows you to send invoices and automatically collect payments even if the orders and amounts change.

Make collecting payments easier than ever

Auto Pay means you no longer have to spend time contacting your customers for payments. Save time while also making the payment process more convenient for your customers.

01 02

Merchant Services in
Los Angeles

Whether you are processing payments in-store, online, or keyed in a virtual terminal, you’ll get the best rates with Dynamic Merchant Solutions.
Get Your Custom Rate
No application or setup fees
No hidden fees
24/7 customer services
In-Person (Average)
1.92%+8¢
Average PIN-Debit Rate 0.91% +8¢

Keyed & Online (Average)

2.38%+25¢

What Our Clients Say
About Dynamic Merchant Solutions.

We’re a leading merchant services company in Los Angeles

Maria Mak

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Founder - The Mart Group

Founder - The Mart Group

Dynamic Merchant

Request a free quote from a top merchant payment
service in Los Angeles.

Apply now and get

hours.
